Member Function Documentation

◆ calculate_scale()

void GLGizmoEmboss::calculate_scale ( )
private
1175 {
1176 Transform3d to_world = m_parent.get_selection().get_first_volume()->world_matrix();
1177 auto to_world_linear = to_world.linear();
1178 auto calc = [&to_world_linear](const Vec3d &axe, std::optional<float>& scale)->bool {
1179 Vec3d axe_world = to_world_linear * axe;
1180 double norm_sq = axe_world.squaredNorm();
1181 if (is_approx(norm_sq, 1.)) {
1182 if (scale.has_value())
1183 scale.reset();
1184 else
1185 return false;
1186 } else {
1187 scale = sqrt(norm_sq);
1188 }
1189 return true;
1190 };
1191
1192 bool exist_change = calc(Vec3d::UnitY(), m_scale_height);
1193 exist_change |= calc(Vec3d::UnitZ(), m_scale_depth);
1194
1195 // Change of scale has to change font imgui font size
1196 if (exist_change)
1197 m_style_manager.clear_imgui_font();
1198}
sqrt
EIGEN_DEVICE_FUNC const SqrtReturnType sqrt() const
Definition ArrayCwiseUnaryOps.h:152
exist_change
bool exist_change(const T &value, const T *default_value)

◆ close()

void GLGizmoEmboss::close ( )
private
1290{
1291 // remove volume when text is empty
1292 if (m_volume != nullptr &&
1293 m_volume->text_configuration.has_value() &&
1294 priv::is_text_empty(m_text)) {
1295 Plater &p = *wxGetApp().plater();
1296 // is the text object?
1297 if (m_volume->is_the_only_one_part()) {
1298 // delete whole object
1299 p.remove(m_parent.get_selection().get_object_idx());
1300 } else {
1301 // delete text volume
1302 p.remove_selected();
1303 }
1304 }
1305
1306 // close gizmo == open it again
1307 auto& mng = m_parent.get_gizmos_manager();
1308 if (mng.get_current_type() == GLGizmosManager::Emboss)
1309 mng.open_gizmo(GLGizmosManager::Emboss);
1310}

◆ create_default_styles()

EmbossStyles GLGizmoEmboss::create_default_styles ( )
staticprivate
948{
949 wxFontEnumerator::InvalidateCache();
950 wxArrayString facenames = wxFontEnumerator::GetFacenames(Facenames::encoding);
951
952 wxFont wx_font_normal = *wxNORMAL_FONT;
953#ifdef __APPLE__
954 // Set normal font to helvetica when possible
955 for (const wxString &facename : facenames) {
956 if (facename.IsSameAs("Helvetica")) {
957 wx_font_normal = wxFont(wxFontInfo().FaceName(facename).Encoding(Facenames::encoding));
958 break;
959 }
960 }
961#endif // __APPLE__
962
963 // https://docs.wxwidgets.org/3.0/classwx_font.html
964 // Predefined objects/pointers: wxNullFont, wxNORMAL_FONT, wxSMALL_FONT, wxITALIC_FONT, wxSWISS_FONT
965 EmbossStyles styles = {
966 WxFontUtils::create_emboss_style(wx_font_normal, _u8L("NORMAL")), // wxSystemSettings::GetFont(wxSYS_DEFAULT_GUI_FONT)
967 WxFontUtils::create_emboss_style(*wxSMALL_FONT, _u8L("SMALL")), // A font using the wxFONTFAMILY_SWISS family and 2 points smaller than wxNORMAL_FONT.
968 WxFontUtils::create_emboss_style(*wxITALIC_FONT, _u8L("ITALIC")), // A font using the wxFONTFAMILY_ROMAN family and wxFONTSTYLE_ITALIC style and of the same size of wxNORMAL_FONT.
969 WxFontUtils::create_emboss_style(*wxSWISS_FONT, _u8L("SWISS")), // A font identic to wxNORMAL_FONT except for the family used which is wxFONTFAMILY_SWISS.
970 WxFontUtils::create_emboss_style(wxFont(10, wxFONTFAMILY_MODERN, wxFONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wxFONTWEIGHT_BOLD), _u8L("MODERN")),
971 };
972
973 // Not all predefined font for wx must be valid TTF, but at least one style must be loadable
974 styles.erase(std::remove_if(styles.begin(), styles.end(), [](const EmbossStyle& style) {
975 wxFont wx_font = WxFontUtils::create_wxFont(style);
976
977 // check that face name is setabled
978 if (style.prop.face_name.has_value()) {
979 wxString face_name(style.prop.face_name->c_str());
980 wxFont wx_font_temp;
981 if (!wx_font_temp.SetFaceName(face_name))
982 return true;
983 }
984
985 // Check that exsit valid TrueType Font for wx font
986 return WxFontUtils::create_font_file(wx_font) == nullptr;
987 }),styles.end()
988 );
989
990 // exist some valid style?
991 if (!styles.empty())
992 return styles;
993
994 // No valid style in defult list
995 // at least one style must contain loadable font
996 wxFont wx_font;
997 for (const wxString &face : facenames) {
998 wx_font = wxFont(face);
999 if (WxFontUtils::create_font_file(wx_font) != nullptr)
1000 break;
1001 wx_font = wxFont(); // NotOk
1002 }
1003
1004 if (wx_font.IsOk()) {
1005 // use first alphabetic sorted installed font
1006 styles.push_back(WxFontUtils::create_emboss_style(wx_font, _u8L("First font")));
1007 } else {
1008 // On current OS is not installed any correct TTF font
1009 // use font packed with Slic3r
1010 std::string font_path = Slic3r::resources_dir() + "/fonts/NotoSans-Regular.ttf";
1011 styles.push_back(EmbossStyle{_u8L("Default font"), font_path, EmbossStyle::Type::file_path});
1012 }
1013 return styles;
1014}
_u8L
#define _u8L(s)
macro used to mark string used at localization, return same string
Definition SLAPrint.cpp:29
style
#define style

◆ create_gui_configuration()

GLGizmoEmboss::GuiCfg GLGizmoEmboss::create_gui_configuration ( )
staticprivate
851{
852 GuiCfg cfg; // initialize by default values;
853
854 float line_height = ImGui::GetTextLineHeight();
855 float line_height_with_spacing = ImGui::GetTextLineHeightWithSpacing();
856 float space = line_height_with_spacing - line_height;
857 const ImGuiStyle &style = ImGui::GetStyle();
858
859 cfg.max_style_name_width = ImGui::CalcTextSize("Maximal font name, extended").x;
860
861 cfg.icon_width = static_cast<unsigned int>(std::ceil(line_height));
862 // make size pair number
863 if (cfg.icon_width % 2 != 0) ++cfg.icon_width;
864
865 cfg.delete_pos_x = cfg.max_style_name_width + space;
866 int count_line_of_text = 3;
867 cfg.text_size = ImVec2(-FLT_MIN, line_height_with_spacing * count_line_of_text);
868 ImVec2 letter_m_size = ImGui::CalcTextSize("M");
869 int count_letter_M_in_input = 12;
870 cfg.input_width = letter_m_size.x * count_letter_M_in_input;
871 GuiCfg::Translations &tr = cfg.translations;
872
873 tr.font = _u8L("Font");
874 tr.height = _u8L("Height");
875 tr.depth = _u8L("Depth");
876
877 float max_text_width = std::max({
878 ImGui::CalcTextSize(tr.font.c_str()).x,
879 ImGui::CalcTextSize(tr.height.c_str()).x,
880 ImGui::CalcTextSize(tr.depth.c_str()).x});
881 cfg.indent = static_cast<float>(cfg.icon_width);
882 cfg.input_offset = style.WindowPadding.x + cfg.indent + max_text_width + space;
883
884 tr.use_surface = _u8L("Use surface");
885 tr.char_gap = _u8L("Char gap");
886 tr.line_gap = _u8L("Line gap");
887 tr.boldness = _u8L("Boldness");
888 tr.skew_ration = _u8L("Skew ratio");
889 tr.from_surface = _u8L("From surface");
890 tr.rotation = _u8L("Rotation");
891 tr.keep_up = "Keep Rotation";
892 tr.collection = _u8L("Collection");
893
894 float max_advanced_text_width = std::max({
895 ImGui::CalcTextSize(tr.use_surface.c_str()).x,
896 ImGui::CalcTextSize(tr.char_gap.c_str()).x,
897 ImGui::CalcTextSize(tr.line_gap.c_str()).x,
898 ImGui::CalcTextSize(tr.boldness.c_str()).x,
899 ImGui::CalcTextSize(tr.skew_ration.c_str()).x,
900 ImGui::CalcTextSize(tr.from_surface.c_str()).x,
901 ImGui::CalcTextSize(tr.rotation.c_str()).x + cfg.icon_width + 2*space,
902 ImGui::CalcTextSize(tr.keep_up.c_str()).x,
903 ImGui::CalcTextSize(tr.collection.c_str()).x });
904 cfg.advanced_input_offset = max_advanced_text_width
905 + 3 * space + cfg.indent;
906 cfg.lock_offset = cfg.advanced_input_offset - (cfg.icon_width + space);
907 // calculate window size
908 float window_title = line_height + 2*style.FramePadding.y + 2 * style.WindowTitleAlign.y;
909 float input_height = line_height_with_spacing + 2*style.FramePadding.y;
910 float tree_header = line_height_with_spacing;
911 float separator_height = 1 + style.FramePadding.y;
912
913 // "Text is to object" + radio buttons
914 cfg.height_of_volume_type_selector = separator_height + line_height_with_spacing + input_height;
915
916 float window_height =
917 window_title + // window title
918 cfg.text_size.y + // text field
919 input_height * 4 + // font name + height + depth + style selector
920 tree_header + // advance tree
921 separator_height + // presets separator line
922 line_height_with_spacing + // "Presets"
923 2 * style.WindowPadding.y;
924 float window_width = cfg.input_offset + cfg.input_width + 2*style.WindowPadding.x
925 + 2 * (cfg.icon_width + space);
926 cfg.minimal_window_size = ImVec2(window_width, window_height);
927
928 // 8 = useSurface, charGap, lineGap, bold, italic, surfDist, rotation, textFaceToCamera
929 // 4 = 1px for fix each edit image of drag float
930 float advance_height = input_height * 8 + 8;
931 cfg.minimal_window_size_with_advance =
932 ImVec2(cfg.minimal_window_size.x,
933 cfg.minimal_window_size.y + advance_height);
934
935 cfg.minimal_window_size_with_collections =
936 ImVec2(cfg.minimal_window_size_with_advance.x,
937 cfg.minimal_window_size_with_advance.y + input_height);
938
939 int max_style_image_width = cfg.max_style_name_width /2 -
940 2 * style.FramePadding.x;
941 int max_style_image_height = 1.5 * input_height;
942 cfg.max_style_image_size = Vec2i(max_style_image_width, max_style_image_height);
943 cfg.face_name_size.y() = line_height_with_spacing;
944 return cfg;
945}

◆ create_volume() [1/2]

void GLGizmoEmboss::create_volume ( ModelVolumeType  volume_type)

Create new text without given position.

Parameters
volume_typeObject part / Negative volume / Modifier
267{
268 if (!init_create(volume_type))
269 return;
270
271 // select position by camera position and view direction
272 const Selection &selection = m_parent.get_selection();
273 int object_idx = selection.get_object_idx();
274
275 Size s = m_parent.get_canvas_size();
276 Vec2d screen_center(s.get_width() / 2., s.get_height() / 2.);
277 DataBase emboss_data = priv::create_emboss_data_base(m_text, m_style_manager, m_job_cancel);
278 const ModelObjectPtrs &objects = selection.get_model()->objects;
279 bool is_simple_mode = wxGetApp().get_mode() == comSimple;
280 // No selected object so create new object
281 if (selection.is_empty() || object_idx < 0 || static_cast<size_t>(object_idx) >= objects.size() || is_simple_mode) {
282 // create Object on center of screen
283 // when ray throw center of screen not hit bed it create object on center of bed
284 priv::start_create_object_job(emboss_data, screen_center);
285 return;
286 }
287
288 // create volume inside of selected object
289 Vec2d coor;
290 const GLVolume *vol = nullptr;
291 const Camera &camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
292 priv::find_closest_volume(selection, screen_center, camera, objects, &coor, &vol);
293 if (vol == nullptr) {
294 priv::start_create_object_job(emboss_data, screen_center);
295 } else if (!priv::start_create_volume_on_surface_job(emboss_data, volume_type, coor, vol, m_raycast_manager, m_parent)) {
296 // in centroid of convex hull is not hit with object
297 // soo create transfomation on border of object
298
299 // there is no point on surface so no use of surface will be applied
300 FontProp &prop = emboss_data.text_configuration.style.prop;
301 if (prop.use_surface)
302 prop.use_surface = false;
303
304 // Transformation is inspired add generic volumes in ObjectList::load_generic_subobject
305 const ModelObject *obj = objects[vol->object_idx()];
306 BoundingBoxf3 instance_bb = obj->instance_bounding_box(vol->instance_idx());
307 // Translate the new modifier to be pickable: move to the left front corner of the instance's bounding box, lift to print bed.
308 Transform3d tr = vol->get_instance_transformation().get_matrix_no_offset().inverse();
309 Vec3d offset_tr(0, // center of instance - Can't suggest width of text before it will be created
310 - instance_bb.size().y() / 2 - prop.size_in_mm / 2, // under
311 prop.emboss / 2 - instance_bb.size().z() / 2 // lay on bed
312 );
313 Transform3d volume_trmat = tr * Eigen::Translation3d(offset_tr);
314 priv::start_create_volume_job(obj, volume_trmat, emboss_data, volume_type);
315 }
316}

◆ create_volume() [2/2]

void GLGizmoEmboss::create_volume ( ModelVolumeType  volume_type,
const Vec2d &  mouse_pos 
)

Create new embossed text volume by type on position of mouse.

Parameters
volume_typeObject part / Negative volume / Modifier
mouse_posDefine position of new volume
245{
246 if (!init_create(volume_type))
247 return;
248
249 const GLVolume *gl_volume = get_first_hovered_gl_volume(m_parent);
250 DataBase emboss_data = priv::create_emboss_data_base(m_text, m_style_manager, m_job_cancel);
251 bool is_simple_mode = wxGetApp().get_mode() == comSimple;
252 if (gl_volume != nullptr && !is_simple_mode) {
253 // Try to cast ray into scene and find object for add volume
254 if (!priv::start_create_volume_on_surface_job(emboss_data, volume_type, mouse_pos, gl_volume, m_raycast_manager, m_parent)) {
255 // When model is broken. It could appear that hit miss the object.
256 // So add part near by in simmilar manner as right panel do
257 create_volume(volume_type);
258 }
259 } else {
260 // object is not under mouse position soo create object on plater
261 priv::start_create_object_job(emboss_data, mouse_pos);
262 }
263}

void GLGizmoEmboss::do_rotate ( float  relative_z_angle)

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::do_stop_dragging ( bool  perform_mouse_cleanup)

281 m_dragging = false;

284 // Reset hover_id when leave window
285 if (perform_mouse_cleanup) m_parent.mouse_up_cleanup();

290 // Data are updated twice also by canvas3D::reload_scene.
291 // Should be fixed.

297 // refresh of the scene with the background processing data should
298 // be performed.

302}

3023 float prev_distance = distance.has_value() ? *distance : .0f,
3024 min_distance = -2 * font_prop.emboss,
3025 max_distance = 2 * font_prop.emboss;

3028 m_imgui->disabled_begin(!allowe_surface_distance);

3033 bool use_inch = wxGetApp().app_config->get_bool("use_inches");

3035 std::optional<float> distance_inch;
3036 if (distance.has_value()) distance_inch = (*distance * ObjectManipulation::mm_to_in);
3037 std::optional<float> def_distance_inch;
3038 if (def_distance != nullptr) {
3039 if (def_distance->has_value()) def_distance_inch = ObjectManipulation::mm_to_in * (*(*def_distance));
3040 def_distance = &def_distance_inch;
3041 }
3042 min_distance *= ObjectManipulation::mm_to_in;
3043 max_distance *= ObjectManipulation::mm_to_in;

3045 if (distance_inch.has_value()) {
3046 font_prop.distance = *distance_inch * ObjectManipulation::in_to_mm;
3047 } else {
3048 font_prop.distance.reset();
3049 }
3050 is_moved = true;
3051 }
3052 } else {

3055 }
3056
3057 if (is_moved){

3060 do_translate(Vec3d::UnitZ() * (act_distance - prev_distance));
3061 }
3062 m_imgui->disabled_end();
3063
3064 // slider for Clock-wise angle in degress
3065 // stored angle is optional CCW and in radians
3066 // Convert stored value to degress
3067 // minus create clock-wise roation from CCW
3068 const std::optional<float> &angle_opt = m_style_manager.get_font_prop().angle;

3070 float angle_deg = static_cast<float>(-angle * 180 / M_PI);
3071 float def_angle_deg_val =
3072 (!stored_style || !stored_style->prop.angle.has_value()) ?
3073 0.f : (*stored_style->prop.angle * -180 / M_PI);

3077 priv::limits.angle.min, priv::limits.angle.max, u8"%.2f °",
3078 _L("Rotate text Clock-wise."))) {
3079 // convert back to radians and CCW
3080 float angle_rad = static_cast<float>(-angle_deg * M_PI / 180.0);

3082
3083
3084 float diff_angle = angle_rad - angle;

3103 const IconManager::Icon &icon_disable = get_icon(m_icons, m_keep_up ? IconType::lock : IconType::unlock, IconState::disabled);

2579 draw(get_icon(m_icons, IconType::bold, IconState::disabled));
2580 return false;
2581 }
2582
2583 std::optional<float> &boldness = m_style_manager.get_font_prop().boldness;
2584 bool is_font_bold = boldness.has_value() || WxFontUtils::is_bold(wx_font);
2585 if (is_font_bold) {
2586 // unset bold

2588 get_icon(m_icons, IconType::unbold, IconState::hovered))) {
2589 boldness.reset();

2591 wxFont new_wx_font = wx_font; // copy
2592 new_wx_font.SetWeight(wxFontWeight::wxFONTWEIGHT_NORMAL);
2593 if(!m_style_manager.set_wx_font(new_wx_font))
2594 return false;
2595 }
2596 return true;
2597 }

2599 ImGui::SetTooltip("%s", _u8L("Unset bold").c_str());
2600 } else {
2601 // set bold
2602 if (draw_button(m_icons, IconType::bold)) {
2603 wxFont new_wx_font = wx_font; // copy
2604 auto new_ff = WxFontUtils::set_bold(new_wx_font, *ff.font_file);
2605 if (new_ff != nullptr) {
2606 if(!m_style_manager.set_wx_font(new_wx_font, std::move(new_ff)))
2607 return false;
2608 } else {
2609 // bold font can't be loaded
2610 // set up boldness
2611 boldness = 20.f;
2612 //font_file->cache.empty();
2613 }
2614 return true;
2615 }
2616 if (ImGui::IsItemHovered())
2617 ImGui::SetTooltip("%s", _u8L("Set bold").c_str());
2618 }
2619 return false;
2620}

2324 wxString dialog_title = _L("Remove style");

2326 Plater *plater = wxGetApp().plater();
2327 bool exist_change = false;
2328 while (true) {
2329 // NOTE: can't use previous loaded activ index -> erase could change index

2331 next_style_index = (active_index > 0) ? active_index - 1 :
2332 active_index + 1;
2333
2334 if (next_style_index >= m_style_manager.get_styles().size()) {
2335 MessageDialog msg(plater, _L("Can't remove the last existing style."), dialog_title, wxICON_ERROR | wxOK);
2336 msg.ShowModal();
2337 break;
2338 }
2339
2340 // IMPROVE: add function can_load?
2341 // clean unactivable styles
2342 if (!m_style_manager.load_style(next_style_index)) {
2343 m_style_manager.erase(next_style_index);
2344 exist_change = true;
2345 continue;
2346 }
2347
2348 wxString message = GUI::format_wxstr(_L("Are you sure you want to permanently remove the \"%1%\" style?"), style_name);
2349 MessageDialog msg(plater, message, dialog_title, wxICON_WARNING | wxYES | wxNO);
2350 if (msg.ShowModal() == wxID_YES) {
2351 // delete style
2352 m_style_manager.erase(active_index);
2353 exist_change = true;
2354 process();
2355 } else {
2356 // load back style
2357 m_style_manager.load_style(active_index);
2358 }
2359 break;
2360 }
2361 if (exist_change)
2362 m_style_manager.store_styles_to_app_config(wxGetApp().app_config);
2363 }
2364

2366 const std::string &style_name = m_style_manager.get_style().name;
2367 std::string tooltip;

2369 else if (is_last) tooltip = GUI::format(_L("Can't delete \"%1%\". It is last style."), style_name);
2370 else/*if(!is_stored)*/ tooltip = GUI::format(_L("Can't delete temporary style \"%1%\"."), style_name);

2372 }

1949 size_t index = &face - &m_face_names.faces.front();

2042 std::vector<wxString>& bad = m_face_names.bad;

2044 auto it = std::upper_bound(bad.begin(), bad.end(), face->wx_name);
2045 bad.insert(it, face->wx_name);
2046 m_face_names.faces.erase(face);
2047 // update cached file
2048 store(m_face_names);
2049 }

2055 if (choose_true_type_file()) {

1873 exist_change = true;

1875 if (draw_bold_button())
1876 exist_change = true;

1882 exist_change = true;
1883 }

1893 style.prop.skew = stored_style->prop.skew;

1896 if (new_wx_font.IsOk() && m_style_manager.set_wx_font(new_wx_font))
1897 exist_change = true;
1898 } else if (ImGui::IsItemHovered())
1899 ImGui::SetTooltip("%s", _u8L("Revert font changes.").c_str());

1901
1902 if (exist_change) {
1903 m_style_manager.clear_glyphs_cache();
1904 process();
1905 }
1906}

void GLGizmoEmboss::draw_font_preview ( FaceName &  face,
bool  is_visible 
)
private
1753{
1754 // Limit for opened font files at one moment
1755 unsigned int &count_opened_fonts = m_face_names.count_opened_font_files;
1756 // Size of texture
1757 ImVec2 size(m_gui_cfg->face_name_size.x(), m_gui_cfg->face_name_size.y());
1758 float count_cached_textures_f = static_cast<float>(m_face_names.count_cached_textures);
1759 std::string state_text;
1760 // uv0 and uv1 set to pixel 0,0 in texture
1761 ImVec2 uv0(0.f, 0.f), uv1(1.f / size.x, 1.f / size.y / count_cached_textures_f);
1762 if (face.is_created != nullptr) {
1763 // not created preview
1764 if (*face.is_created) {
1765 // Already created preview
1766 size_t texture_index = face.texture_index;
1767 uv0 = ImVec2(0.f, texture_index / count_cached_textures_f);
1768 uv1 = ImVec2(1.f, (texture_index + 1) / count_cached_textures_f);
1769 } else {
1770 // Not finished preview
1771 if (is_visible) {
1772 // when not canceled still loading
1773 state_text = std::string(" ") + (face.cancel->load() ?
1774 _u8L("No symbol") :
1775 (dots.ToStdString() + _u8L("Loading")));
1776 } else {
1777 // not finished and not visible cancel job
1778 face.is_created = nullptr;
1779 face.cancel->store(true);
1780 }
1781 }
1782 } else if (is_visible && count_opened_fonts < m_gui_cfg->max_count_opened_font_files) {
1783 ++count_opened_fonts;
1784 face.cancel = std::make_shared<std::atomic_bool>(false);
1785 face.is_created = std::make_shared<bool>(false);
1786
1787 const unsigned char gray_level = 5;
1788 // format type and level must match to texture data
1789 const GLenum format = GL_RGBA, type = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
1790 const GLint level = 0;
1791 // select next texture index
1792 size_t texture_index = (m_face_names.texture_index + 1) % m_face_names.count_cached_textures;
1793
1794 // set previous cach as deleted
1795 for (FaceName &f : m_face_names.faces)
1796 if (f.texture_index == texture_index) {
1797 if (f.cancel != nullptr) f.cancel->store(true);
1798 f.is_created = nullptr;
1799 }
1800
1801 m_face_names.texture_index = texture_index;
1802 face.texture_index = texture_index;
1803
1804 // render text to texture
1805 FontImageData data{
1806 m_text,
1807 face.wx_name,
1808 m_face_names.encoding,
1809 m_face_names.texture_id,
1810 m_face_names.texture_index,
1811 m_gui_cfg->face_name_size,
1812 gray_level,
1813 format,
1814 type,
1815 level,
1816 &count_opened_fonts,
1817 face.cancel, // copy
1818 face.is_created // copy
1819 };
1820 auto job = std::make_unique<CreateFontImageJob>(std::move(data));
1821 auto &worker = wxGetApp().plater()->get_ui_job_worker();
1822 queue_job(worker, std::move(job));
1823 } else {
1824 // cant start new thread at this moment so wait in queue
1825 state_text = " " + dots.ToStdString() + " " + _u8L("Queue");
1826 }
1827
1828 if (!state_text.empty()) {
1829 ImGui::SameLine(m_gui_cfg->face_name_texture_offset_x);
1830 m_imgui->text(state_text);
1831 }
1832
1833 ImGui::SameLine(m_gui_cfg->face_name_texture_offset_x);
1834 ImTextureID tex_id = (void *) (intptr_t) m_face_names.texture_id;
1835 ImGui::Image(tex_id, size, uv0, uv1);
1836}

2531 const auto& ff = m_style_manager.get_font_file_with_cache();
2532 if (!wx_font.IsOk() || !ff.has_value()) {
2533 draw(get_icon(m_icons, IconType::italic, IconState::disabled));
2534 return false;
2535 }
2536
2537 std::optional<float> &skew = m_style_manager.get_font_prop().skew;
2538 bool is_font_italic = skew.has_value() || WxFontUtils::is_italic(wx_font);
2539 if (is_font_italic) {
2540 // unset italic
2541 if (clickable(get_icon(m_icons, IconType::italic, IconState::hovered),
2542 get_icon(m_icons, IconType::unitalic, IconState::hovered))) {
2543 skew.reset();
2544 if (wx_font.GetStyle() != wxFontStyle::wxFONTSTYLE_NORMAL) {
2545 wxFont new_wx_font = wx_font; // copy
2546 new_wx_font.SetStyle(wxFontStyle::wxFONTSTYLE_NORMAL);
2547 if(!m_style_manager.set_wx_font(new_wx_font))
2548 return false;
2549 }
2550 return true;
2551 }
2552 if (ImGui::IsItemHovered())
2553 ImGui::SetTooltip("%s", _u8L("Unset italic").c_str());
2554 } else {
2555 // set italic
2556 if (draw_button(m_icons, IconType::italic)) {
2557 wxFont new_wx_font = wx_font; // copy
2558 auto new_ff = WxFontUtils::set_italic(new_wx_font, *ff.font_file);
2559 if (new_ff != nullptr) {
2560 if(!m_style_manager.set_wx_font(new_wx_font, std::move(new_ff)))
2561 return false;
2562 } else {
2563 // italic font doesn't exist
2564 // add skew when wxFont can't set it
2565 skew = 0.2f;
2566 }
2567 return true;
2568 }
2569 if (ImGui::IsItemHovered())
2570 ImGui::SetTooltip("%s", _u8L("Set italic").c_str());
2571 }
2572 return false;
2573}

2087 ModelVolumeType negative = ModelVolumeType::NEGATIVE_VOLUME;

2101 else if (ImGui::IsItemHovered()) {
2102 if (is_last_solid_part)
2103 ImGui::SetTooltip("%s", last_solid_part_hint.c_str());
2104 else if (type != negative)
2105 ImGui::SetTooltip("%s", _u8L("Click to change part type into negative volume.").c_str());
2106 }
2107
2108 // In simple mode are not modifiers

2113 else if (ImGui::IsItemHovered()) {

2115 ImGui::SetTooltip("%s", last_solid_part_hint.c_str());
2116 else if (type != modifier)
2117 ImGui::SetTooltip("%s", _u8L("Click to change part type into modifier.").c_str());

2122 GUI_App &app = wxGetApp();
2123 Plater * plater = app.plater();
2124 Plater::TakeSnapshot snapshot(plater, _L("Change Text Type"), UndoRedo::SnapshotType::GizmoAction);
2125 m_volume->set_type(*new_type);
2126
2127 // Update volume position when switch from part or into part
2128 if (m_volume->text_configuration->style.prop.use_surface) {
2129 // move inside
2130 bool is_volume_move_inside = (type == part);
2131 bool is_volume_move_outside = (*new_type == part);
2132 if (is_volume_move_inside || is_volume_move_outside) process();
2133 }
2134

2136 // how to view correct side panel with objects

2139 obj_list->get_selected_obj_idx(),
2140 [volume = m_volume](const ModelVolume *vol) { return vol == volume; });
2141 if (!sel.IsEmpty()) obj_list->select_item(sel.front());
2142
2143 // NOTE: on linux, function reorder_volumes_and_get_selection call GLCanvas3D::reload_scene(refresh_immediately = false)

2405 stored_style = m_style_manager.get_stored_style();
2406 const EmbossStyle &actual_style = m_style_manager.get_style();

2408 bool is_modified = is_stored && is_changed;
2409

2413 // generate trunc name
2414 std::string current_name = actual_style.name;
2415 ImGuiWrapper::escape_double_hash(current_name);
2416 trunc_name = ImGuiWrapper::trunc(current_name, max_style_name_width);
2417 }
2418

2424
2425 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(m_gui_cfg->input_width);
2426 auto add_text_modify = [&is_modified](const std::string& name) {
2427 if (!is_modified) return name;
2428 return name + Preset::suffix_modified();
2429 };
2430 std::optional<size_t> selected_style_index;
2431 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##style_selector", add_text_modify(trunc_name).c_str())) {

2433 m_style_manager.init_trunc_names(max_style_name_width);
2434 std::optional<std::pair<size_t,size_t>> swap_indexes;
2435 const std::vector<StyleManager::Item> &styles = m_style_manager.get_styles();
2436 for (const auto &item : styles) {
2437 size_t index = &item - &styles.front();
2438 const EmbossStyle &style = item.style;
2439 const std::string &actual_style_name = style.name;
2440 ImGui::PushID(actual_style_name.c_str());
2441 bool is_selected = (index == m_style_manager.get_style_index());
2442
2443 ImVec2 select_size(0,m_gui_cfg->max_style_image_size.y()); // 0,0 --> calculate in draw
2444 const std::optional<StyleManager::StyleImage> &img = item.image;
2445 // allow click delete button
2446 ImGuiSelectableFlags_ flags = ImGuiSelectableFlags_AllowItemOverlap;
2447 if (ImGui::Selectable(item.truncated_name.c_str(), is_selected, flags, select_size)) {
2448 selected_style_index = index;
2449 } else if (ImGui::IsItemHovered())
2450 ImGui::SetTooltip("%s", actual_style_name.c_str());
2451
2452 // reorder items
2453 if (ImGui::IsItemActive() && !ImGui::IsItemHovered()) {
2454 if (ImGui::GetMouseDragDelta(0).y < 0.f) {
2455 if (index > 0)
2456 swap_indexes = {index, index - 1};
2457 } else if ((index + 1) < styles.size())
2458 swap_indexes = {index, index + 1};
2459 if (swap_indexes.has_value())
2460 ImGui::ResetMouseDragDelta();
2461 }
2462
2463 // draw style name
2464 if (img.has_value()) {
2465 ImGui::SameLine(max_style_name_width);
2466 ImGui::Image(img->texture_id, img->tex_size, img->uv0, img->uv1);
2467 }
2468
2469 ImGui::PopID();
2470 }
2471 if (swap_indexes.has_value())
2472 m_style_manager.swap(swap_indexes->first,
2473 swap_indexes->second);
2474 ImGui::EndCombo();
2475 } else {
2476 // do not keep in memory style images when no combo box open
2477 m_style_manager.free_style_images();
2478 if (ImGui::IsItemHovered()) {
2479 std::string style_name = add_text_modify(actual_style.name);
2480 std::string tooltip = is_modified?
2481 GUI::format(_L("Modified style \"%1%\""), actual_style.name):
2482 GUI::format(_L("Current style is \"%1%\""), actual_style.name);
2483 ImGui::SetTooltip(" %s", tooltip.c_str());
2484 }
2485 }
2486
2487 // Check whether user wants lose actual style modification
2488 if (selected_style_index.has_value() && is_modified) {
2489 const EmbossStyle &style = m_style_manager.get_styles()[*selected_style_index].style;
2490 wxString message = GUI::format_wxstr(_L("Changing style to \"%1%\" will discard current style modification.\n\nWould you like to continue anyway?"), style.name);
2491 MessageDialog not_loaded_style_message(nullptr, message, _L("Warning"), wxICON_WARNING | wxYES | wxNO);
2492 if (not_loaded_style_message.ShowModal() != wxID_YES)
2493 selected_style_index.reset();
2494 }
2495
2496 // selected style from combo box
2497 if (selected_style_index.has_value()) {
2498 const EmbossStyle &style = m_style_manager.get_styles()[*selected_style_index].style;
2499 // create copy to be able do fix transformation only when successfully load style
2500 FontProp act_prop = actual_style.prop; // copy
2501 FontProp new_prop = style.prop; // copy
2502 if (m_style_manager.load_style(*selected_style_index)) {
2503 fix_transformation(act_prop, new_prop);
2504 process();
2505 } else {
2506 wxString title = _L("Not valid style.");

2509 not_loaded_style_message.ShowModal();

2511 }
2512 }

void GLGizmoEmboss::draw_style_rename_popup ( )
private
2152 {
2153 std::string& new_name = m_style_manager.get_style().name;
2154 const std::string &old_name = m_style_manager.get_stored_style()->name;
2155 std::string text_in_popup = GUI::format(_L("Rename style(%1%) for embossing text"), old_name) + ": ";
2156 ImGui::Text("%s", text_in_popup.c_str());
2157
2158 bool is_unique = true;
2159 for (const auto &item : m_style_manager.get_styles()) {
2160 const EmbossStyle &style = item.style;
2161 if (&style == &m_style_manager.get_style())
2162 continue; // could be same as original name
2163 if (style.name == new_name) is_unique = false;
2164 }
2165 bool allow_change = false;
2166 if (new_name.empty()) {
2167 m_imgui->text_colored(ImGuiWrapper::COL_ORANGE_DARK, _u8L("Name can't be empty."));
2168 }else if (!is_unique) {
2169 m_imgui->text_colored(ImGuiWrapper::COL_ORANGE_DARK, _u8L("Name has to be unique."));
2170 } else {
2171 ImGui::NewLine();

2173 }
2174

2177 if (ImGui::InputText("##rename style", &new_name, flags) && allow_change) store = true;
2178 if (m_imgui->button(_L("OK"), ImVec2(0.f, 0.f), allow_change)) store = true;
2179 ImGui::SameLine();
2180 if (ImGui::Button(_u8L("Cancel").c_str())) {
2181 new_name = old_name;
2182 ImGui::CloseCurrentPopup();
2183 }
2184
2185 if (store) {
2186 // rename style in all objects and volumes
2187 for (ModelObject *mo :wxGetApp().plater()->model().objects) {
2188 for (ModelVolume *mv : mo->volumes) {
2189 if (!mv->text_configuration.has_value()) continue;
2190 std::string& name = mv->text_configuration->style.name;
2191 if (name != old_name) continue;
2192 name = new_name;
2193 }
2194 }
2195
2196 m_style_manager.rename(new_name);
2197 m_style_manager.store_styles_to_app_config();
2198 ImGui::CloseCurrentPopup();
2199 }
2200}

void GLGizmoEmboss::draw_style_save_as_popup ( )
private
2240 {
2241 ImGui::Text("%s", (_u8L("New name of style") +": ").c_str());
2242
2243 // use name inside of volume configuration as temporary new name
2244 std::string &new_name = m_volume->text_configuration->style.name;
2245
2246 bool is_unique = true;
2247 for (const auto &item : m_style_manager.get_styles())
2248 if (item.style.name == new_name) is_unique = false;
2249
2250 bool allow_change = false;
2251 if (new_name.empty()) {
2252 m_imgui->text_colored(ImGuiWrapper::COL_ORANGE_DARK, _u8L("Name can't be empty."));
2253 }else if (!is_unique) {
2254 m_imgui->text_colored(ImGuiWrapper::COL_ORANGE_DARK, _u8L("Name has to be unique."));
2255 } else {
2256 ImGui::NewLine();

2258 }

2266 save_style = true;

2276 m_style_manager.add_style(new_name);
2277 m_style_manager.store_styles_to_app_config();
2278 ImGui::CloseCurrentPopup();

Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ fix_transformation()

void GLGizmoEmboss::fix_transformation ( const FontProp &  from,
const FontProp &  to 
)
private
2378{
2379 // fix Z rotation when exists difference in styles
2380 const std::optional<float> &f_angle_opt = from.angle;
2381 const std::optional<float> &t_angle_opt = to.angle;
2382 if (!is_approx(f_angle_opt, t_angle_opt)) {
2383 // fix rotation
2384 float f_angle = f_angle_opt.has_value() ? *f_angle_opt : .0f;
2385 float t_angle = t_angle_opt.has_value() ? *t_angle_opt : .0f;
2386 do_rotate(t_angle - f_angle);
2387 }
2388
2389 // fix distance (Z move) when exists difference in styles
2390 const std::optional<float> &f_move_opt = from.distance;
2391 const std::optional<float> &t_move_opt = to.distance;
2392 if (!is_approx(f_move_opt, t_move_opt)) {
2393 float f_move = f_move_opt.has_value() ? *f_move_opt : .0f;
2394 float t_move = t_move_opt.has_value() ? *t_move_opt : .0f;
2395 do_translate(Vec3d::UnitZ() * (t_move - f_move));
2396 }
2397}

References Slic3r::FontProp::angle, Slic3r::FontProp::distance, do_rotate(), do_translate(), and Slic3r::is_approx().

◆ init_create()

bool GLGizmoEmboss::init_create ( ModelVolumeType  volume_type)
private
334{
335 // check valid volume type
336 if (volume_type != ModelVolumeType::MODEL_PART &&
337 volume_type != ModelVolumeType::NEGATIVE_VOLUME &&
338 volume_type != ModelVolumeType::PARAMETER_MODIFIER){
339 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(error) << "Can't create embossed volume with this type: " << (int) volume_type;
340 return false;
341 }
342
343 if (!is_activable()) {
344 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(error) << "Can't create text. Gizmo is not activabled.";
345 return false;
346 }
347
348 // Check can't be inside is_activable() cause crash
349 // steps to reproduce: start App -> key 't' -> key 'delete'
350 if (wxGetApp().obj_list()->has_selected_cut_object()) {
351 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(error) << "Can't create text on cut object";
352 return false;
353 }
354
355 m_style_manager.discard_style_changes();
356
357 // set default text
358 m_text = _u8L("Embossed text");
359 return true;
360}

◆ init_face_names()

void GLGizmoEmboss::init_face_names ( Facenames &  facenames)
staticprivate
1633{
1634 Timer t("enumerate_fonts");
1635 if (face_names.is_init) return;
1636 face_names.is_init = true;
1637
1638 // to reload fonts from system, when install new one
1639 wxFontEnumerator::InvalidateCache();
1640
1641 // try load cache
1642 // Only not OS enumerated face has hash value 0
1643 if (face_names.hash == 0) {
1644 load(face_names);
1645 face_names.has_truncated_names = false;
1646 }
1647
1648 using namespace std::chrono;
1649 steady_clock::time_point enumerate_start = steady_clock::now();
1650 ScopeGuard sg([&enumerate_start, &face_names = face_names]() {
1651 steady_clock::time_point enumerate_end = steady_clock::now();
1652 long long enumerate_duration = duration_cast<milliseconds>(enumerate_end - enumerate_start).count();
1653 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << "OS enumerate " << face_names.faces.size() << " fonts "
1654 << "(+ " << face_names.bad.size() << " can't load "
1655 << "= " << face_names.faces.size() + face_names.bad.size() << " fonts) "
1656 << "in " << enumerate_duration << " ms\n" << concat(face_names.bad);
1657 });
1658 wxArrayString facenames = wxFontEnumerator::GetFacenames(face_names.encoding);
1659 size_t hash = boost::hash_range(facenames.begin(), facenames.end());
1660 // Zero value is used as uninitialized hash
1661 if (hash == 0) hash = 1;
1662 // check if it is same as last time
1663 if (face_names.hash == hash) {
1664 // no new installed font
1665 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << "Same FontNames hash, cache is used. "
1666 << "For clear cache delete file: " << get_fontlist_cache_path().string();
1667 return;
1668 }
1669
1670 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << ((face_names.hash == 0) ?
1671 "FontName list is generate from scratch." :
1672 "Hash are different. Only previous bad fonts are used and set again as bad");
1673 face_names.hash = hash;
1674
1675 // validation lambda
1676 auto is_valid_font = [encoding = face_names.encoding, bad = face_names.bad /*copy*/](const wxString &name) {
1677 if (name.empty()) return false;
1678
1679 // vertical font start with @, we will filter it out
1680 // Not sure if it is only in Windows so filtering is on all platforms
1681 if (name[0] == '@') return false;
1682
1683 // previously detected bad font
1684 auto it = std::lower_bound(bad.begin(), bad.end(), name);
1685 if (it != bad.end() && *it == name) return false;
1686
1687 wxFont wx_font(wxFontInfo().FaceName(name).Encoding(encoding));
1688 //*
1689 // Faster chech if wx_font is loadable but not 100%
1690 // names could contain not loadable font
1691 if (!WxFontUtils::can_load(wx_font)) return false;
1692
1693 /*/
1694 // Slow copy of font files to try load font
1695 // After this all files are loadable
1696 auto font_file = WxFontUtils::create_font_file(wx_font);
1697 if (font_file == nullptr)
1698 return false; // can't create font file
1699 // */
1700 return true;
1701 };
1702
1703 face_names.faces.clear();
1704 face_names.bad.clear();
1705 face_names.faces.reserve(facenames.size());
1706 std::sort(facenames.begin(), facenames.end());
1707 for (const wxString &name : facenames) {
1708 if (is_valid_font(name)) {
1709 face_names.faces.push_back({name});
1710 }else{
1711 face_names.bad.push_back(name);
1712 }
1713 }
1714 assert(std::is_sorted(face_names.bad.begin(), face_names.bad.end()));
1715 face_names.has_truncated_names = false;
1716 store(face_names);
1717}

static boost::filesystem::path get_fontlist_cache_path()
Definition GLGizmoEmboss.cpp:1534
concat

◆ init_font_name_texture()

void GLGizmoEmboss::init_font_name_texture ( )
private
1720 {
1721 Timer t("init_font_name_texture");
1722 // check if already exists
1723 GLuint &id = m_face_names.texture_id;
1724 if (id != 0) return;
1725 // create texture for font
1726 GLenum target = GL_TEXTURE_2D;
1727 glsafe(::glGenTextures(1, &id));
1728 glsafe(::glBindTexture(target, id));
1729 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(target, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST));
1730 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(target, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST));
1731 const Vec2i &size = m_gui_cfg->face_name_size;
1732 GLint w = size.x(), h = m_face_names.count_cached_textures * size.y();
1733 std::vector<unsigned char> data(4*w * h, {0});
1734 const GLenum format = GL_RGBA, type = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
1735 const GLint level = 0, internal_format = GL_RGBA, border = 0;
1736 glsafe(::glTexImage2D(target, level, internal_format, w, h, border, format, type, data.data()));
1737
1738 // bind default texture
1739 GLuint no_texture_id = 0;
1740 glsafe(::glBindTexture(target, no_texture_id));
1741
1742 // clear info about creation of texture - no one is initialized yet
1743 for (FaceName &face : m_face_names.faces) {
1744 face.cancel = nullptr;
1745 face.is_created = nullptr;
1746 }
1747
1748 // Prepare filtration cache
1749 m_face_names.hide = std::vector<bool>(m_face_names.faces.size(), {false});
1750}
GLuint
unsigned int GLuint
Definition glu-libtess.h:62

◆ load() [2/2]

bool GLGizmoEmboss::load ( Facenames &  facenames)
staticprivate
1594 {
1595 boost::filesystem::path path = get_fontlist_cache_path();
1596 std::string path_str = path.string();
1597 if (!boost::filesystem::exists(path)) {
1598 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(warning) << "Fontlist cache - '" << path_str << "' does not exists.";
1599 return false;
1600 }
1601 boost::nowide::ifstream file(path_str, std::ios::binary);
1602 cereal::BinaryInputArchive archive(file);
1603
1604 FacenamesSerializer data;
1605 try {
1606 archive(data);
1607 } catch (const std::exception &ex) {
1608 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(error) << "Failed to load fontlist cache - '" << path_str << "'. Exception: " << ex.what();
1609 return false;
1610 }
1611
1612 assert(std::is_sorted(data.bad.begin(), data.bad.end()));
1613 assert(std::is_sorted(data.good.begin(), data.good.end()));
1614
1615 facenames.hash = data.hash;
1616 facenames.faces.reserve(data.good.size());
1617 for (const wxString &face : data.good)
1618 facenames.faces.push_back({face});
1619 facenames.bad = data.bad;
1620 return true;
1621}
FacenamesSerializer

◆ on_mouse_change_selection()

void GLGizmoEmboss::on_mouse_change_selection ( const wxMouseEvent &  mouse_event)
private
460{
461 static bool was_dragging = true;
462 if ((mouse_event.LeftUp() || mouse_event.RightUp()) && !was_dragging) {
463 // is hovered volume closest hovered?
464 int hovered_idx = m_parent.get_first_hover_volume_idx();
465 if (hovered_idx < 0)
466 // unselect object
467 return close();
468
469 const GLVolumePtrs &gl_volumes = m_parent.get_volumes().volumes;
470 auto hovered_idx_ = static_cast<size_t>(hovered_idx);
471 if (hovered_idx_ >= gl_volumes.size())
472 return close();
473
474 const GLVolume *gl_volume = gl_volumes[hovered_idx_];
475 if (gl_volume == nullptr)
476 return close();
477
478 const ModelVolume *volume = get_model_volume(*gl_volume, m_parent.get_model()->objects);
479 if (volume == nullptr || !volume->text_configuration.has_value())
480 // select volume without text configuration
481 return close();
482
483 // Reselection of text to another text
484 }
485 was_dragging = mouse_event.Dragging();
486
487 // Hook When click on object for reselection must be on event left down not up
488 if (mouse_event.LeftDown()) {
489 // is hovered volume closest hovered?
490 int hovered_idx = m_parent.get_first_hover_volume_idx();
491 if (hovered_idx < 0)
492 // Potentionaly move with camera (drag)
493 return;
494
495 const GLVolumePtrs &gl_volumes = m_parent.get_volumes().volumes;
496 auto hovered_idx_ = static_cast<size_t>(hovered_idx);
497 if (hovered_idx_ >= gl_volumes.size())
498 return;
499 const GLVolume *gl_volume = gl_volumes[hovered_idx_];
500 if (gl_volume == nullptr)
501 return;
502 const ModelVolume *volume = get_model_volume(*gl_volume, m_parent.get_model()->objects);
503 if (volume == nullptr)
504 return;
505
506 if (volume->text_configuration.has_value())
507 return; // Reselection of text to another text
508
509 // select volume without text configuration
510 return close();
511 }
512
513 // Hook When drag with scene by right mouse button
514 // object it is selected after drag scene !!
515 if (mouse_event.RightDown()) {
516 // is hovered volume closest hovered?
517 int hovered_idx = m_parent.get_first_hover_volume_idx();
518 if (hovered_idx < 0)
519 // Potentionaly move with camera (drag)
520 return;
521
522 const GLVolumePtrs &gl_volumes = m_parent.get_volumes().volumes;
523 auto hovered_idx_ = static_cast<size_t>(hovered_idx);
524 if (hovered_idx_ >= gl_volumes.size())
525 return;
526 const GLVolume *gl_volume = gl_volumes[hovered_idx_];
527 if (gl_volume == nullptr)
528 return;
529 const ModelVolume *volume = get_model_volume(*gl_volume, m_parent.get_model()->objects);
530 if (volume == nullptr)
531 return;
532
533 // is actual selected?
534 if (m_volume->id() == volume->id())
535 return;
536
537 // select volume without text configuration
538 return close();
539 }
540}

GLVolumePtrs volumes

◆ on_mouse_for_rotation()

bool GLGizmoEmboss::on_mouse_for_rotation ( const wxMouseEvent &  mouse_event)
private
373{
374 if (mouse_event.Moving()) return false;
375
376 bool used = use_grabbers(mouse_event);
377 if (!m_dragging) return used;
378
379 if (mouse_event.Dragging()) {
380 if (!m_rotate_start_angle.has_value()) {
381 // when m_rotate_start_angle is not set mean it is not Dragging
382 // when angle_opt is not set mean angle is Zero
383 const std::optional<float> &angle_opt = m_style_manager.get_font_prop().angle;
384 m_rotate_start_angle = angle_opt.has_value() ? *angle_opt : 0.f;
385 }
386
387 double angle = m_rotate_gizmo.get_angle();
388 angle -= PI / 2; // Grabber is upward
389
390 // temporary rotation
391 Selection& selection = m_parent.get_selection();
392 selection.rotate(Vec3d(0., 0., angle), get_transformation_type(selection));
393
394 angle += *m_rotate_start_angle;
395 // move to range <-M_PI, M_PI>
396 priv::to_range_pi_pi(angle);
397
398 // set into activ style
399 assert(m_style_manager.is_active_font());
400 if (m_style_manager.is_active_font()) {
401 std::optional<float> angle_opt;
402 if (!is_approx(angle, 0.))
403 angle_opt = angle;
404 m_style_manager.get_font_prop().angle = angle_opt;
405 }
406 }
407 return used;
408}
Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::use_grabbers
bool use_grabbers(const wxMouseEvent &mouse_event)
function which Set up m_dragging and call functions on_start_dragging / on_dragging / on_stop_draggin...
Definition GLGizmoBase.cpp:229

std::optional< float > m_rotate_start_angle

◆ on_mouse_for_translate()

bool GLGizmoEmboss::on_mouse_for_translate ( const wxMouseEvent &  mouse_event)
private
411{
412 // exist selected volume?
413 if (m_volume == nullptr)
414 return false;
415
416 std::optional<double> up_limit;
417 if (m_keep_up) up_limit = priv::up_limit;
418 const Camera &camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
419 bool was_dragging = m_surface_drag.has_value();
420 bool res = on_mouse_surface_drag(mouse_event, camera, m_surface_drag, m_parent, m_raycast_manager, up_limit);
421 bool is_dragging = m_surface_drag.has_value();
422
423 // End with surface dragging?
424 if (was_dragging && !is_dragging) {
425 // Update surface by new position
426 if (m_volume->text_configuration->style.prop.use_surface)
427 process();
428
429 // Show correct value of height & depth inside of inputs
430 calculate_scale();
431 }
432
433 // Start with dragging
434 else if (!was_dragging && is_dragging) {
435 // Cancel job to prevent interuption of dragging (duplicit result)
436 if (m_job_cancel != nullptr)
437 m_job_cancel->store(true);
438 }
439
440 // during drag
441 else if (was_dragging && is_dragging) {
442 // update scale of selected volume --> should be approx the same
443 calculate_scale();
444
445 // Recalculate angle for GUI
446 if (!m_keep_up) {
447 const GLVolume *gl_volume = get_selected_gl_volume(m_parent.get_selection());
448 assert(gl_volume != nullptr);
449 assert(m_style_manager.is_active_font());
450 if (gl_volume == nullptr || !m_style_manager.is_active_font())
451 return res;
452
453 m_style_manager.get_style().prop.angle = calc_up(gl_volume->world_matrix(), priv::up_limit);
454 }
455 }
456 return res;
457}

◆ on_render()

void GLGizmoEmboss::on_render ( )
overrideprotectedvirtual

Implements Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase.

574 {
575 // no volume selected
576 if (m_volume == nullptr ||
577 get_model_volume(m_volume_id, m_parent.get_selection().get_model()->objects) == nullptr)
578 return;
579 Selection &selection = m_parent.get_selection();
580 if (selection.is_empty()) return;
581
582 // prevent get local coordinate system on multi volumes
583 if (!selection.is_single_volume_or_modifier() &&
584 !selection.is_single_volume_instance()) return;
585 bool is_surface_dragging = m_surface_drag.has_value();
586 bool is_parent_dragging = m_parent.is_mouse_dragging();
587 // Do NOT render rotation grabbers when dragging object
588 bool is_rotate_by_grabbers = m_dragging;
589 if (is_rotate_by_grabbers ||
590 (!is_surface_dragging && !is_parent_dragging)) {
591 glsafe(::glClear(GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT));
592 m_rotate_gizmo.render();
593 }
594}

◆ on_render_input_window()

void GLGizmoEmboss::on_render_input_window ( float  x,
float  y,
float  bottom_limit 
)
overrideprotectedvirtual

Reimplemented from Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase.

659{
660 assert(m_volume != nullptr);
661 // Do not render window for not selected text volume
662 if (m_volume == nullptr ||
663 get_model_volume(m_volume_id, m_parent.get_selection().get_model()->objects) == nullptr ||
664 !m_volume->text_configuration.has_value()) {
665 // This closing could lead to bad behavior of undo/redo stack when unselection create snapshot before close
666 close();
667 return;
668 }
669
670 // Not known situation when could happend this is only for sure
671 if (!m_is_unknown_font && !m_style_manager.is_active_font())
672 create_notification_not_valid_font("No active font in style. Select correct one.");
673 else if (!m_is_unknown_font && !m_style_manager.get_wx_font().IsOk())
674 create_notification_not_valid_font("WxFont is not loaded properly.");
675
676 // Configuration creation
677 double screen_scale = wxDisplay(wxGetApp().plater()).GetScaleFactor();
678 float main_toolbar_height = m_parent.get_main_toolbar_height();
679 if (!m_gui_cfg.has_value() || // Exist configuration - first run
680 m_gui_cfg->screen_scale != screen_scale || // change of DPI
681 m_gui_cfg->main_toolbar_height != main_toolbar_height // change size of view port
682 ) {
683 // Create cache for gui offsets
684 GuiCfg cfg = create_gui_configuration();
685 cfg.screen_scale = screen_scale;
686 cfg.main_toolbar_height = main_toolbar_height;
687 m_gui_cfg.emplace(std::move(cfg));
688 // set position near toolbar
689 m_set_window_offset = ImVec2(-1.f, -1.f);
690
691 // change resolution regenerate icons
692 init_icons();
693 m_style_manager.clear_imgui_font();
694 }
695
696 const ImVec2 &min_window_size = get_minimal_window_size();
697 ImGui::PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_WindowMinSize, min_window_size);
698
699 // Draw origin position of text during dragging
700 if (m_surface_drag.has_value()) {
701 ImVec2 mouse_pos = ImGui::GetMousePos();
702 ImVec2 center(
703 mouse_pos.x + m_surface_drag->mouse_offset.x(),
704 mouse_pos.y + m_surface_drag->mouse_offset.y());
705 ImU32 color = ImGui::GetColorU32(
706 m_surface_drag->exist_hit ?
707 ImVec4(1.f, 1.f, 1.f, .75f) : // transparent white
708 ImVec4(1.f, .3f, .3f, .75f)
709 ); // Warning color
710 const float radius = 16.f;
711 ImGuiWrapper::draw_cross_hair(center, radius, color);
712 }
713
714#ifdef SHOW_FINE_POSITION
715 draw_fine_position(m_parent.get_selection(), m_parent.get_canvas_size(), min_window_size);
716#endif // SHOW_FINE_POSITION
717#ifdef DRAW_PLACE_TO_ADD_TEXT
718 draw_place_to_add_text();
719#endif // DRAW_PLACE_TO_ADD_TEXT
720#ifdef SHOW_OFFSET_DURING_DRAGGING
721 draw_mouse_offset(m_dragging_mouse_offset);
722#endif // SHOW_OFFSET_DURING_DRAGGING
723
724 // check if is set window offset
725 if (m_set_window_offset.has_value()) {
726 if (m_set_window_offset->y < 0)
727 // position near toolbar
728 m_set_window_offset = ImVec2(x, std::min(y, bottom_limit - min_window_size.y));
729
730 ImGui::SetNextWindowPos(*m_set_window_offset, ImGuiCond_Always);
731 m_set_window_offset.reset();
732 } else if (!m_allow_open_near_volume) {
733 y = std::min(y, bottom_limit - min_window_size.y);
734 // position near toolbar
735 ImVec2 pos(x, y);
736 ImGui::SetNextWindowPos(pos, ImGuiCond_Once);
737 }
738
739 bool is_opened = true;
740 ImGuiWindowFlags flag = ImGuiWindowFlags_NoCollapse;
741 if (ImGui::Begin(on_get_name().c_str(), &is_opened, flag)) {
742 // Need to pop var before draw window
743 ImGui::PopStyleVar(); // WindowMinSize
744 draw_window();
745 } else {
746 ImGui::PopStyleVar(); // WindowMinSize
747 }
748
749 // after change volume from object to volume it is necessary to recalculate
750 // minimal windows size because of set type
751 if (m_should_set_minimal_windows_size) {
752 m_should_set_minimal_windows_size = false;
753 ImGui::SetWindowSize(ImVec2(0.f, min_window_size.y), ImGuiCond_Always);
754 }
755
756 ImGui::End();
757 if (!is_opened)
758 close();
759}
Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::get_main_toolbar_height
float get_main_toolbar_height()

◆ on_set_state()

void GLGizmoEmboss::on_set_state ( )
overrideprotectedvirtual

Reimplemented from Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase.

777{
778 // enable / disable bed from picking
779 // Rotation gizmo must work through bed
780 m_parent.set_raycaster_gizmos_on_top(m_state == GLGizmoBase::On);
781
782 m_rotate_gizmo.set_state(m_state);
783
784 // Closing gizmo. e.g. selecting another one
785 if (m_state == GLGizmoBase::Off) {
786 // refuse outgoing during text preview
787 reset_volume();
788 // Store order and last activ index into app.ini
789 // TODO: what to do when can't store into file?
790 m_style_manager.store_styles_to_app_config(false);
791 remove_notification_not_valid_font();
792 } else if (m_state == GLGizmoBase::On) {
793 // to reload fonts from system, when install new one
794 wxFontEnumerator::InvalidateCache();
795
796 // Immediately after set state On is called function data_changed(),
797 // where one could distiguish undo/redo serialization from opening by letter 'T'
798 // set_volume_by_selection();
799
800 // change position of just opened emboss window
801 if (m_allow_open_near_volume) {
802 m_set_window_offset = priv::calc_fine_position(m_parent.get_selection(), get_minimal_window_size(), m_parent.get_canvas_size());
803 } else {
804 if (m_gui_cfg.has_value())
805 priv::change_window_position(m_set_window_offset, false);
806 else
807 m_set_window_offset = ImVec2(-1, -1);
808 }
809
810 // when open by hyperlink it needs to show up
811 // or after key 'T' windows doesn't appear
812 m_parent.set_as_dirty();
813 }
814}

318 {
319 set_volume_by_selection();

824{
825 m_rotate_gizmo.stop_dragging();

843

◆ process()

bool GLGizmoEmboss::process ( )
private
1224{
1225 // no volume is selected -> selection from right panel
1226 assert(m_volume != nullptr);
1227 if (m_volume == nullptr) return false;
1228
1229 // without text there is nothing to emboss
1230 if (m_text.empty()) return false;
1231
1232 // exist loaded font file?
1233 if (!m_style_manager.is_active_font()) return false;
1234
1235 DataUpdate data{priv::create_emboss_data_base(m_text, m_style_manager, m_job_cancel), m_volume->id()};
1236
1237 std::unique_ptr<Job> job = nullptr;
1238
1239 // check cutting from source mesh
1240 bool &use_surface = data.text_configuration.style.prop.use_surface;
1241 bool is_object = m_volume->get_object()->volumes.size() == 1;
1242 if (use_surface && is_object)
1243 use_surface = false;
1244
1245 if (use_surface) {
1246 // Model to cut surface from.
1247 SurfaceVolumeData::ModelSources sources = create_volume_sources(m_volume);
1248 if (sources.empty()) return false;
1249
1250 Transform3d text_tr = m_volume->get_matrix();
1251 auto& fix_3mf = m_volume->text_configuration->fix_3mf_tr;
1252 if (fix_3mf.has_value())
1253 text_tr = text_tr * fix_3mf->inverse();
1254
1255 // when it is new applying of use surface than move origin onto surfaca
1256 if (!m_volume->text_configuration->style.prop.use_surface) {
1257 auto offset = calc_surface_offset(m_parent.get_selection(), m_raycast_manager);
1258 if (offset.has_value())
1259 text_tr *= Eigen::Translation<double, 3>(*offset);
1260 }
1261
1262 bool is_outside = m_volume->is_model_part();
1263 // check that there is not unexpected volume type
1264 assert(is_outside || m_volume->is_negative_volume() ||
1265 m_volume->is_modifier());
1266 UpdateSurfaceVolumeData surface_data{std::move(data), {text_tr, is_outside, std::move(sources)}};
1267 job = std::make_unique<UpdateSurfaceVolumeJob>(std::move(surface_data));
1268 } else {
1269 job = std::make_unique<UpdateJob>(std::move(data));
1270 }
1271
1272#ifndef EXECUTE_PROCESS_ON_MAIN_THREAD
1273 auto &worker = wxGetApp().plater()->get_ui_job_worker();
1274 queue_job(worker, std::move(job));
1275#else
1276 // Run Job on main thread (blocking) - ONLY DEBUG
1277 priv::execute_job(std::move(job));
1278#endif // EXECUTE_PROCESS_ON_MAIN_THREAD
1279
1280 // notification is removed befor object is changed by job
1281 remove_notification_not_valid_font();
1282 return true;
1283}
Slic3r::ModelVolume::is_model_part
bool is_model_part() const
Definition Model.hpp:839
Slic3r::ModelVolume::is_modifier
bool is_modifier() const
Definition Model.hpp:841

const Transform3d & get_matrix() const
Definition Model.hpp:922

bool is_negative_volume() const
Definition Model.hpp:840
Eigen::Translation
Represents a translation transformation.

◆ render_grabbers() [3/3]

void Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::render_grabbers ( size_t  first,
size_t  last,
float  size,
bool  force_hover 
) const
protectedinherited
212{
213 GLShaderProgram* shader = wxGetApp().get_shader("gouraud_light");
214 if (shader == nullptr)
215 return;
216 shader->start_using();
217 shader->set_uniform("emission_factor", 0.1f);
218 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE));
219 for (size_t i = first; i <= last; ++i) {
220 if (m_grabbers[i].enabled)
221 m_grabbers[i].render(force_hover ? true : m_hover_id == (int)i, size);
222 }
223 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE));
224 shader->stop_using();
225}

True when value changed otherwise FALSE.

)
private
2696{
2697 // _variable which temporary keep value
2698 float value_ = value;
2699 float default_value_;
2700 if (use_inch) {
2701 // calc value in inch
2702 value_ *= ObjectManipulation::mm_to_in;
2703 if (default_value_ptr) {
2704 default_value_ = ObjectManipulation::mm_to_in * (*default_value_ptr);
2705 default_value_ptr = &default_value_;
2706 }
2707 }
2708 if (scale.has_value())
2709 value_ *= *scale;
2710 bool use_correction = use_inch || scale.has_value();
2711 if (rev_input(name, use_correction ? value_ : value, default_value_ptr, undo_tooltip, step, step_fast, format)) {
2712 if (use_correction) {
2713 value = value_;
2714 if (use_inch)
2715 value *= ObjectManipulation::in_to_mm;
2716 if (scale.has_value())
2717 value /= *scale;
2718 }
2719 return true;
2720 }
2721 return false;
2722}

◆ select_facename()

bool GLGizmoEmboss::select_facename ( const wxString &  facename)
private
1839{
1840 if (!wxFontEnumerator::IsValidFacename(facename)) return false;
1841 // Select font
1842 const wxFontEncoding &encoding = m_face_names.encoding;
1843 wxFont wx_font(wxFontInfo().FaceName(facename).Encoding(encoding));
1844 if (!wx_font.IsOk()) return false;
1845#ifdef USE_PIXEL_SIZE_IN_WX_FONT
1846 // wx font could change source file by size of font
1847 int point_size = static_cast<int>(m_style_manager.get_font_prop().size_in_mm);
1848 wx_font.SetPointSize(point_size);
1849#endif // USE_PIXEL_SIZE_IN_WX_FONT
1850 if (!m_style_manager.set_wx_font(wx_font)) return false;
1851 process();
1852 return true;
1853}

◆ set_height()

bool GLGizmoEmboss::set_height ( )
private
2739 {
2740 float &value = m_style_manager.get_style().prop.size_in_mm;
2741
2742 // size can't be zero or negative
2743 priv::Limits::apply(value, priv::limits.size_in_mm);
2744
2745 if (m_volume == nullptr || !m_volume->text_configuration.has_value()) {
2746 assert(false);
2747 return false;
2748 }
2749
2750 // only different value need process
2751 if (is_approx(value, m_volume->text_configuration->style.prop.size_in_mm))
2752 return false;
2753
2754#ifdef USE_PIXEL_SIZE_IN_WX_FONT
2755 // store font size into path serialization
2756 const wxFont &wx_font = m_style_manager.get_wx_font();
2757 if (wx_font.IsOk()) {
2758 wxFont wx_font_new = wx_font; // copy
2759 wx_font_new.SetPointSize(static_cast<int>(value));
2760 m_style_manager.set_wx_font(wx_font_new);
2761 }
2762#endif
2763 return true;
2764}

◆ set_volume_by_selection()

void GLGizmoEmboss::set_volume_by_selection ( )
private
1017{
1018 const Selection &selection = m_parent.get_selection();
1019 const GLVolume *gl_volume = get_selected_gl_volume(selection);
1020 if (gl_volume == nullptr)
1021 return reset_volume();
1022
1023 const ModelObjectPtrs &objects = m_parent.get_model()->objects;
1024 ModelVolume *volume = get_model_volume(*gl_volume, objects);
1025 if (volume == nullptr)
1026 return reset_volume();
1027
1028 // is same volume as actual selected?
1029 if (volume->id() == m_volume_id &&
1030 m_volume != nullptr &&
1031 volume->text_configuration->style == m_volume->text_configuration->style)
1032 return;
1033
1034 // for changed volume notification is NOT valid
1035 remove_notification_not_valid_font();
1036
1037 // Do not use focused input value when switch volume(it must swith value)
1038 if (m_volume != nullptr &&
1039 m_volume != volume) // when update volume it changed id BUT not pointer
1040 ImGuiWrapper::left_inputs();
1041
1042 // Is selected volume text volume?
1043 const std::optional<TextConfiguration>& tc_opt = volume->text_configuration;
1044 if (!tc_opt.has_value())
1045 return reset_volume();
1046
1047 const TextConfiguration &tc = *tc_opt;
1048 const EmbossStyle &style = tc.style;
1049
1050 // Could exist OS without getter on face_name,
1051 // but it is able to restore font from descriptor
1052 // Soo default value must be TRUE
1053 bool is_font_installed = true;
1054 wxString face_name;
1055 std::optional<std::string> face_name_opt = style.prop.face_name;
1056 if (face_name_opt.has_value()) {
1057 face_name = wxString(face_name_opt->c_str());
1058
1059 // search in enumerated fonts
1060 // refresh list of installed font in the OS.
1061 init_face_names(m_face_names);
1062 m_face_names.is_init = false;
1063
1064 auto cmp = [](const FaceName &fn, const wxString& face_name)->bool { return fn.wx_name < face_name; };
1065 const std::vector<FaceName> &faces = m_face_names.faces;
1066 auto it = std::lower_bound(faces.begin(), faces.end(), face_name, cmp);
1067 is_font_installed = it != faces.end() && it->wx_name == face_name;
1068
1069 if (!is_font_installed) {
1070 const std::vector<wxString> &bad = m_face_names.bad;
1071 auto it_bad = std::lower_bound(bad.begin(), bad.end(), face_name);
1072 if (it_bad == bad.end() || *it_bad != face_name){
1073 // check if wx allowed to set it up - another encoding of name
1074 wxFontEnumerator::InvalidateCache();
1075 wxFont wx_font_; // temporary structure
1076 if (wx_font_.SetFaceName(face_name) &&
1077 WxFontUtils::create_font_file(wx_font_) != nullptr // can load TTF file?
1078 ) {
1079 is_font_installed = true;
1080 // QUESTION: add this name to allowed faces?
1081 // Could create twin of font face name
1082 // When not add it will be hard to select it again when change font
1083 }
1084 }
1085 }
1086 }
1087
1088 wxFont wx_font;
1089 // load wxFont from same OS when font name is installed
1090 if (style.type == WxFontUtils::get_actual_type() && is_font_installed)
1091 wx_font = WxFontUtils::load_wxFont(style.path);
1092
1093 // Flag that is selected same font
1094 bool is_exact_font = true;
1095 // Different OS or try found on same OS
1096 if (!wx_font.IsOk()) {
1097 is_exact_font = false;
1098 // Try create similar wx font by FontFamily
1099 wx_font = WxFontUtils::create_wxFont(style);
1100 if (is_font_installed)
1101 is_exact_font = wx_font.SetFaceName(face_name);
1102
1103 // Have to use some wxFont
1104 if (!wx_font.IsOk())
1105 wx_font = wxSystemSettings::GetFont(wxSYS_DEFAULT_GUI_FONT);
1106 }
1107 assert(wx_font.IsOk());
1108
1109 // Load style to style manager
1110 const auto& styles = m_style_manager.get_styles();
1111 auto has_same_name = [&style](const StyleManager::Item &style_item) -> bool {
1112 const EmbossStyle &es = style_item.style;
1113 return es.name == style.name;
1114 };
1115 auto it = std::find_if(styles.begin(), styles.end(), has_same_name);
1116 if (it == styles.end()) {
1117 // style was not found
1118 m_style_manager.load_style(style, wx_font);
1119 } else {
1120 // style name is in styles list
1121 size_t style_index = it - styles.begin();
1122 if (!m_style_manager.load_style(style_index)) {
1123 // can`t load stored style
1124 m_style_manager.erase(style_index);
1125 m_style_manager.load_style(style, wx_font);
1126 } else {
1127 // stored style is loaded, now set modification of style
1128 m_style_manager.get_style() = style;
1129 m_style_manager.set_wx_font(wx_font);
1130 }
1131 }
1132
1133 if (!is_exact_font)
1134 create_notification_not_valid_font(tc);
1135
1136 // The change of volume could show or hide part with setter on volume type
1137 if (m_volume == nullptr ||
1138 get_model_volume(m_volume_id, objects) == nullptr ||
1139 (m_volume->get_object()->volumes.size() == 1) !=
1140 (volume->get_object()->volumes.size() == 1)){
1141 m_should_set_minimal_windows_size = true;
1142 }
1143
1144 // cancel previous job
1145 if (m_job_cancel != nullptr) {
1146 m_job_cancel->store(true);
1147 m_job_cancel = nullptr;
1148 }
1149
1150 m_text = tc.text;
1151 m_volume = volume;
1152 m_volume_id = volume->id();
1153
1154 // Calculate current angle of up vector
1155 assert(m_style_manager.is_active_font());
1156 if (m_style_manager.is_active_font())
1157 m_style_manager.get_font_prop().angle = calc_up(gl_volume->world_matrix(), priv::up_limit);
1158
1159 // calculate scale for height and depth inside of scaled object instance
1160 calculate_scale();
1161}

All connected with one style keep temporary data and caches for style.
Definition EmbossStyleManager.hpp:189

static wxFont create_wxFont(const EmbossStyle &style)
Definition WxFontUtils.cpp:224
Slic3r::TextConfiguration
Define how to create 'Text volume' It is stored into .3mf by TextConfigurationSerialization It is par...
Definition TextConfiguration.hpp:215
Slic3r::TextConfiguration::text

◆ store()

bool GLGizmoEmboss::store ( const Facenames &  facenames)
staticprivate
1573 {
1574 std::string cache_path = get_fontlist_cache_path().string();
1575 boost::nowide::ofstream file(cache_path, std::ios::binary);
1576 cereal::BinaryOutputArchive archive(file);
1577 std::vector<wxString> good;
1578 good.reserve(facenames.faces.size());
1579 for (const FaceName &face : facenames.faces) good.push_back(face.wx_name);
1580 FacenamesSerializer data = {facenames.hash, good, facenames.bad};
1581
1582 assert(std::is_sorted(data.bad.begin(), data.bad.end()));
1583 assert(std::is_sorted(data.good.begin(), data.good.end()));
1584
1585 try {
1586 archive(data);
1587 } catch (const std::exception &ex) {
1588 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(error) << "Failed to write fontlist cache - " << cache_path << ex.what();
1589 return false;
1590 }
1591 return true;
1592}

◆ use_grabbers()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoBase::use_grabbers ( const wxMouseEvent &  mouse_event)
protectedinherited

function which Set up m_dragging and call functions on_start_dragging / on_dragging / on_stop_dragging

Parameters
mouse_eventKeep information about mouse click
Returns
same as on_mouse
229 {
230 bool is_dragging_finished = false;
231 if (mouse_event.Moving()) {
232 // it should not happen but for sure
233 assert(!m_dragging);
234 if (m_dragging) is_dragging_finished = true;
235 else return false;
236 }
237
238 if (mouse_event.LeftDown()) {
239 Selection &selection = m_parent.get_selection();
240 if (!selection.is_empty() && m_hover_id != -1 /* &&
241 (m_grabbers.empty() || m_hover_id < static_cast<int>(m_grabbers.size()))*/) {
242 selection.setup_cache();
243
244 m_dragging = true;
245 for (auto &grabber : m_grabbers) grabber.dragging = false;
246// if (!m_grabbers.empty() && m_hover_id < int(m_grabbers.size()))
247// m_grabbers[m_hover_id].dragging = true;
248
249 on_start_dragging();
250
251 // Let the plater know that the dragging started
252 m_parent.post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_MOUSE_DRAGGING_STARTED));
253 m_parent.set_as_dirty();
254 return true;
255 }
256 } else if (m_dragging) {
257 // when mouse cursor leave window than finish actual dragging operation
258 bool is_leaving = mouse_event.Leaving();
259 if (mouse_event.Dragging()) {
260 Point mouse_coord(mouse_event.GetX(), mouse_event.GetY());
261 auto ray = m_parent.mouse_ray(mouse_coord);
262 UpdateData data(ray, mouse_coord);
263
264 on_dragging(data);
265
266 wxGetApp().obj_manipul()->set_dirty();
267 m_parent.set_as_dirty();
268 return true;
269 }
270 else if (mouse_event.LeftUp() || is_leaving || is_dragging_finished) {
271 do_stop_dragging(is_leaving);
272 return true;
273 }
274 }
275 return false;
276}
